revised_title: Ancient Writing Instruments and Materials: Stylus and Charta
tldr: The author examines the history and use of the stylus, an ancient writing instrument, and various types of charta, or writing materials, used by the ancients. The article discusses the different materials and shapes of styluses, their purposes, and how they were used alongside various types of charta, such as papyrus, parchment, and paper. The author also explores the evolution of writing tools and materials over time, from reeds and ink to modern pens and paper.
